# <a name="microsoft-edge---policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-103">Microsoft Edge - Политики</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-103">Microsoft Edge - Policies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-104">Последняя версия Microsoft Edge включает в себя следующие политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-104">The latest version of Microsoft Edge includes the following policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-105">Эти политики можно использовать для настройки работы Microsoft Edge в вашей организации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-105">You can use these policies to configure how Microsoft Edge runs in your organization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-106">Информацию о дополнительном наборе политик, используемых для управления тем, как и когда обновляется Microsoft Edge, можно найти в [справочнике по политике обновления Microsoft Edge](microsoft-edge-update-policies.md).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-106">For information about an additional set of policies used to control how and when Microsoft Edge is updated, check out [Microsoft Edge update policy reference](microsoft-edge-update-policies.md).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-107">Вы можете скачать [Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319) для рекомендуемых базовых параметров конфигурации безопасности для Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-107">You can download the [Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319) for the recommended security configuration baseline settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-108">Дополнительные сведения см. в [блоге Microsoft Security Baselines](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-108">For more information see the [Microsoft Security Baselines Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines).</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-109">Эта статья относится к Microsoft Edge версии 77 или более поздней.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-109">This article applies to Microsoft Edge version 77 or later.</span></span>

  ## <a name="application-guard-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-923">Политики параметров Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-923">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-924">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-924">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardcontainerproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-925">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-925">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-container-proxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-926">Прокси-сервер контейнера Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-926">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-927">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-927">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-928">В Windows с 84 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-928">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-929">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-929">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-930">Настраивает параметры прокси-сервера для Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-930">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36e66-931">Если эта политика включена, Microsoft Edge Application Guard игнорирует другие источники конфигураций прокси-сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-931">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-932">Если эта политика не настроена, Microsoft Edge Application Guard использует конфигурацию прокси-сервера узла.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-932">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-933">Эта политика не влияет на конфигурацию прокси-сервера Microsoft Edge за пределами Application Guard (на узле).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-933">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-934">Поле ProxyMode позволяет указать прокси-сервер, используемый Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-934">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-935">Поле ProxyPacUrl - это URL-адрес прокси-файла .pac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-935">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-936">Поле ProxyServer является URL-адресом прокси-сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-936">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-937">Если вы выберете значение "direct" для поля "ProxyMode", все остальные поля будут игнорироваться.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-937">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-938">Если вы выберете значение «auto_detect» как «ProxyMode», все остальные поля будут игнорироваться.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-938">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-939">Если вы выберите значение "fixed_servers" для "ProxyMode", будет использоваться поле "ProxyServer".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-939">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-940">Если вы выберите значение "pac_script" для "ProxyMode", будет использоваться поле "ProxyPacUrl".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-940">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-941">Дополнительные сведения о том, как идентифицировать трафик Application Guard с использованием двойного прокси-сервера, можно найти в статье [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-941">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-942">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-942">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-943">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-943">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-944">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-944">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-945">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-945">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-946">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-946">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-947">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-947">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-948">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-948">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-949">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-949">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-950">Уникальное имя групповой политики: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-950">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-951">Имя групповой политики: Прокси-сервер контейнера Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-951">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-952">Путь к групповой политике (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-952">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-953">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-953">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-954">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-954">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-955">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-955">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-956">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-956">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-957">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-957">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-958">Имя значения: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-958">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-959">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-959">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-960">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-960">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct",
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac",
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-961">Компактный пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-961">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {"ProxyMode": "direct", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-962">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-962">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardfavoritessyncenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-963">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-963">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-favorites-sync-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-964">Включена синхронизация избранного в Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-964">Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-965">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-965">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-966">В Windows 90 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-966">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-967">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-967">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-968">Эта политика позволяет компьютерам и устройствам с Microsoft Edge, на которых включено расширение Application Guard, синхронизировать избранное с главного компьютера с контейнером, чтобы оно совпадало.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-968">This policy allows Microsoft Edge computers/devices that have application guard enabled to sync favorites from the host to the container so the favorites match.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-969">Если настроено свойство [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites), управляемое избранное также синхронизируется с контейнером.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-969">If [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) are configured, those favorites will also be synced to the container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-970">Если вы включите эту политику, изменение избранного в контейнере будет отключено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-970">If you enable this policy, editing favorites in the container is disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-971">В этом случае кнопки "Добавить избранное" и "Добавить папку "Избранное"" будут размыты в пользовательском интерфейсе браузера контейнера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-971">So, the add favorites and add favorites folder buttons will be blurred out in the UI of the container browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-972">Если вы отключите или не настроите эту политику, избранное на главном компьютере не будет отправлено в контейнер.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-972">If you disable or don't configure this policy, favorites on the host will not be shared to the container.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-973">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-973">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-974">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-974">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-975">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-975">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-976">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-976">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-977">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-977">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-978">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-978">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-979">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-979">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-980">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-980">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-981">Уникальное имя GP: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-981">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-982">Имя GP: Включена синхронизация избранного в Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-982">GP name: Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-983">Путь к GP (обязательный): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-983">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-984">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-984">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-985">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-985">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-986">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-986">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-987">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-987">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-988">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-988">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-989">Имя значения: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-989">Value Name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-990">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-990">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-991">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-991">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-992">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-992">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardtrafficidentificationenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-993">ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-993">ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-traffic-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-994">Идентификация трафика Application Guard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-994">Application Guard Traffic Identification</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-995">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-995">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-996">В Windows начиная с 91 и во всех последующих версиях</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-996">On Windows since 91 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-997">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-997">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-998">Если включить или не настроить эту политику, Application Guard будет добавлять дополнительный заголовок HTTP (X-MS-ApplicationGuard-Initiated) во все исходящие запросы HTTP, сделанные из контейнера Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-998">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Application Guard will add an extra HTTP header (X-MS-ApplicationGuard-Initiated) to all outbound HTTP requests made from the Application Guard container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-999">Если отключить эту политику, дополнительный заголовок не будет добавляться в трафик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-999">If you disable this policy, the extra header is not added to the traffic.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1000">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1000">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1001">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1001">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1002">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1002">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1003">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1003">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1004">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1004">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1005">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1005">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1006">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1006">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1007">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1007">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1008">Уникальное имя GP: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1008">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1009">Имя GP: Application Guard Traffic Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1009">GP name: Application Guard Traffic Identification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1010">Путь к GP (обязательно): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1010">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1011">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1011">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1012">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1012">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1013">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1013">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1014">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1014">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1015">Путь (рекомендуется): Н/Д</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1015">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1016">Имя значения: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1016">Value Name: ApplicationGuardTrafficIdentificationEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1017">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1017">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1018">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1018">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="cast-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1020">Политики передачи</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1020">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1021">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1021">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enablemediarouter"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1022">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1022">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-google-cast"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1023">Включить Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1023">Enable Google Cast</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1024">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1024">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1025">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1025">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1026">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1026">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1027">Включите эту политику, чтобы включить Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1027">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1028">Пользователи смогут запускать его из меню приложения, контекстных меню страницы, элементов управления мультимедиа на веб-сайтах с поддержкой Cast и (если отображается) значка панели инструментов Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1028">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1029">Отключите эту политику, чтобы отключить Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1029">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1030">По умолчанию Google Cast включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1030">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1031">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1031">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1032">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1032">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1033">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1033">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1034">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1034">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1035">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1035">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1036">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1036">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1037">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1037">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1038">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1038">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1039">Уникальное имя GP: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1039">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1040">Название GP: Включить Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1040">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1041">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1041">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1042">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1042">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1043">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1043">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1044">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1044">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1045">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1045">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1046">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1046">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1047">Имя значения: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1047">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1048">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1048">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1049">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1049">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1050">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1051">Имя ключа предпочтения: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1051">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1052">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1053">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="showcasticonintoolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1054">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1054">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-the-cast-icon-in-the-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1055">Показать иконку передачи на панели инструментов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1055">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1056">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1056">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1057">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1057">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1058">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1058">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1059">Установите для этой политики значение true, чтобы отображать значок панели инструментов Cast на панели инструментов или в меню переполнения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1059">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1060">Пользователи не смогут удалить это.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1060">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1061">Если вы не настроите эту политику или отключите ее, пользователи смогут закрепить или удалить значок, используя его контекстное меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1061">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1062">Если вы также установили для политики [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) значение false, эта политика игнорируется и значок панели инструментов не отображается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1062">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1063">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1063">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1064">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1064">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1065">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1065">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1066">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1066">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1067">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1067">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1068">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1068">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1069">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1069">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1070">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1070">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1071">Уникальное имя GP: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1071">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1072">Имя GP: Показать иконку на панели инструментов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1072">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1073">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1073">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1074">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1074">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1075">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1075">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1076">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1076">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1077">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1077">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1078">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1078">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1079">Имя значения: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1079">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1080">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1080">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1081">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1081">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1082">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1082">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1083">Имя ключа настройки: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1083">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1084">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1084">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <a name="content-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1086">Политики настроек контента</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1086">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1087">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1087">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1088">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1088">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-select-client-certificates-for-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1089">Автоматически выбирать клиентские сертификаты для этих сайтов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1089">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1090">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1090">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1091">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1091">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1092">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1092">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1093">При настройке политики вы можете создать список шаблонов URL-адресов, которые определяют сайты, для которых Microsoft Edge может автоматически выбрать сертификат клиента.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1093">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1094">Значение — это массив стрингифиедных словарей JSON, каждый из которых имеет форму {"Pattern": "$URL _PATTERN", "Filter": $FILTER}, где $URL _PATTERN является шаблоном настройки содержимого.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1094">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1095">$FILTER ограничивает сертификаты клиентов, которые автоматически выбираются в браузере.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1095">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1096">Независимо от фильтра, выделяются только сертификаты, совпадающие с запросом сертификата сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1096">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1097">Примеры использования раздела $FILTER:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1097">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1098">Если для параметра $FILTER задано значение {"издатель": {"CN": "$ISSUER _CN"}}, выделяются только те сертификаты, которые были созданы сертификатом с _CN Коммоннаме $ISSUER.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1098">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1099">Если $FILTER содержит оба раздела "издатель" и "Тема", то выбираются только сертификаты клиента, удовлетворяющие обоим условиям.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1099">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1100">Если $FILTER содержит раздел "Тема" со значением "O", сертификату необходимо по крайней мере одна организация, соответствующая выбранному значению.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1100">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1101">Если $FILTER содержит раздел "Тема" со значением "OU", сертификату требуется по крайней мере одно подразделение, в котором выбрано указанное значение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1101">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1102">Если для $FILTER задано значение {}, выбор сертификатов клиента также не ограничивается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1102">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1103">Обратите внимание на то, что фильтры, предоставляемые веб-сервером, по-своему применяются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1103">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1104">Если политика не задана, Автовыбор для любого сайта отсутствует.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1104">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1105">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1105">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1106">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1106">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1107">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1107">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1108">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1108">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1109">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1109">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1110">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1110">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1111">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1111">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1112">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1112">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1113">Уникальное имя GP: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1113">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1114">Имя GP: автоматически выбирать клиентские сертификаты для этих сайтов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1114">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1115">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки содержимого</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1115">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1116">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1116">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1117">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1117">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1118">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1118">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1119">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1119">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1120">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1120">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1121">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1121">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1122">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1122">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1123">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1123">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1124">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1124">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1125">Имя предпочтительного ключа: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1125">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1126">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1126">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1127">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1127">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1128">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1128">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1129">Разрешить куки на определенных сайтах</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1129">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1130">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1130">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1131">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1131">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1132">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1132">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1133">Определите список сайтов на основе шаблонов URL, которым разрешено устанавливать файлы cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1133">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1134">Если вы не настроите эту политику, глобальное значение по умолчанию из политики [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (если установлено) или личная конфигурация пользователя используется для всех сайтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1134">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1135">См. Политики [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) и [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) для получения дополнительной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1135">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1136">Обратите внимание, что между этими тремя политиками не может быть конфликтующих шаблонов URL:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1136">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1137">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1137">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1138">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1138">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1139">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1139">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1140">Подробные сведения о шаблонах допустимых URL-адресов см. на странице [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1140">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1141">\* не является допустимым значением для этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1141">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1142">Чтобы исключить удаление файлов cookie при выходе, настройте политику [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1142">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1143">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1143">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1144">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1144">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1145">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1145">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1146">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1146">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1147">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1147">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1148">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1148">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1149">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1149">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1150">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1150">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1151">Уникальное имя GP: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1151">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1152">Название GP: Разрешить куки на определенных сайтах</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1152">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1153">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки содержимого</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1153">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1154">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1154">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1155">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1155">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1156">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1156">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1157">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1157">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1158">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1158">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1159">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1159">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1160">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1160">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1161">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1161">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1162">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1162">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1163">Имя предпочтительного ключа: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1163">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1164">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1164">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1165">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1165">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1166">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1166">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1167">Блокировка cookie-файлов на определенных сайтах</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1167">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1168">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1168">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1169">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1169">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1170">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1170">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1171">Определите список сайтов на основе шаблонов URL, которые не могут устанавливать файлы cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1171">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1172">Если вы не настроите эту политику, глобальное значение по умолчанию из политики [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (если установлено) или личная конфигурация пользователя используется для всех сайтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1172">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1173">Посмотрите политики [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) и [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) для получения дополнительной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1173">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1174">Обратите внимание, что между этими тремя политиками не может быть конфликтующих шаблонов URL:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1174">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1175">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1175">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1176">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1176">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1177">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1177">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1178">Подробные сведения о допустимом шаблоне URL-адресов см. в [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1178">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1179">\* не является принятым значением для этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1179">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1180">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1180">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1181">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1181">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1182">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1182">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1183">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1183">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1184">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1184">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1185">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1185">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1186">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1186">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1187">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1187">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1188">Уникальное имя GP: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1188">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1189">Название GP: блокировать куки на определенных сайтах</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1189">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1190">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки содержимого</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1190">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1191">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1191">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1192">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1192">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1193">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1193">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1194">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1194">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1195">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1195">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1196">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1196">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1197">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1197">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1198">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1198">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1199">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1199">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1200">Имя предпочтительного ключа: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1200">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1201">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1201">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1202">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1202">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiessessiononlyforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1203">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1203">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="limit-cookies-from-specific-websites-to-the-current-session"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1204">Ограничить использование файлов cookie с определенных веб-сайтов текущим сеансом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1204">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1205">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1205">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1206">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1206">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1207">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1207">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1208">Файлы cookie, созданные веб-сайтами, которые соответствуют заданному вами шаблону URL, удаляются по окончании сеанса (когда окно закрывается).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1208">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1209">Файлы cookie, создаваемые веб-сайтами, которые не соответствуют шаблону, контролируются политикой [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (если установлена) или личной конфигурацией пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1209">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1210">Это также поведение по умолчанию, если политика не настроена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1210">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1211">Чтобы контролировать, какие веб-сайты могут создавать файлы cookie, можно также использовать политики [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) и [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1211">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1212">Обратите внимание, что между этими тремя политиками не может быть конфликтующих шаблонов URL:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1212">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1213">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1213">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1214">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1214">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1215">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1215">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1216">Подробные сведения о допустимом шаблоне URL-адресов см. в [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1216">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1217">\* не является принятым значением для этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1217">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1218">Если вы устанавливаете политику [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) для восстановления URL-адресов из предыдущих сеансов, эта политика игнорируется, и файлы cookie постоянно сохраняются для этих сайтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1218">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1219">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1219">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1220">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1220">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1221">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1221">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1222">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1222">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1223">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1223">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1224">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1224">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1225">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1225">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1226">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1226">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1227">Уникальное имя GP: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1227">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1228">Имя GP: ограничение файлов cookie с определенных веб-сайтов на текущий сеанс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1228">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1229">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки содержимого</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1229">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1230">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1230">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1231">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1231">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1232">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1232">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1233">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1233">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1234">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1234">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1235">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1235">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1236">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1236">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1237">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1237">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1238">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1238">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1239">Имя ключа предпочтения: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1239">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1240">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1240">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1241">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1241">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultcookiessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1242">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1242">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1243">Настройка файлов cookie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1243">Configure cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1244">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1244">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1245">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1245">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1246">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1246">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1247">Проверьте, могут ли веб-сайты создавать файлы cookie на устройстве пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1247">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1248">Это правило «все или ничего» - вы можете разрешить всем веб-сайтам создавать файлы cookie, или никакие веб-сайты не создают файлы cookie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1248">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1249">Вы не можете использовать эту политику для включения файлов cookie с определенных веб-сайтов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1249">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1250">Установите для политики параметр 'SessionOnly', чтобы стирать файлы cookie при закрытии сеанса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1250">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1251">Если политика не настроена, используется значение по умолчанию "AllowCookies", и пользователи могут изменить этот параметр в настройках Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1251">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1252">(Если вы не хотите, чтобы пользователи могли изменять этот параметр, установите политику.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1252">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1253">Сопоставление параметров политики:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1253">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1254">AllowCookies (1) = Разрешить всем сайтам создавать cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1254">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1255">BlockCookies (2) = Не разрешать сайтам создавать cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1255">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1256">SessionOnly (4) = Сохранять файлы cookie в течение сеанса, кроме перечисленных в [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1256">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-1257">Используйте изложенные выше сведения при настройке этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1257">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1258">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1258">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1259">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1259">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1260">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1260">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1261">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1261">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1262">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1262">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1263">целое число</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1263">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1264">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1264">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-1265">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1265">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1266">Уникальное имя GP: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1266">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-1267">Название GP: настроить cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-1267">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
