  ## <a name="extensions-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2795">Политики расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2795">Extensions policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2796">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2796">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="blockexternalextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2797">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2797">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="blocks-external-extensions-from-being-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2798">Блокировка установки внешних расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2798">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2799">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2799">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2800">На Windows и macOS начиная с 88 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2800">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2801">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2801">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2802">Управление установкой внешних расширений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2802">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2803">Если этот параметр включен, внешние расширения будут заблокированы для установки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2803">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2804">Если этот параметр отключен или не задан, внешние расширения разрешено устанавливать.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2804">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2805">Внешние расширения и их установка описаны [здесь](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2805">External extensions and their installation are documented [here](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2806">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2806">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2807">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2807">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2808">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2808">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2809">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2809">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2810">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2810">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2811">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2811">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2812">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2812">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2813">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2813">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2814">Уникальное имя GP: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2814">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2815">Имя GP: Блокировка установки внешних расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2815">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2816">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2816">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2817">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2817">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2818">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2818">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2819">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2819">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2820">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2820">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2821">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2821">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2822">Имя значения: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2822">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2823">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2823">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2824">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2824">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2825">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2825">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2826">Имя ключа предпочтения: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2826">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2827">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2827">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2828">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2828">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensionallowedtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2829">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2829">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-allowed-extension-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2830">Настройте разрешенные типы расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2830">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2831">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2831">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2832">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2832">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2833">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2833">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2834">Настройка политики определяет, какие приложения и расширения можно установить в Microsoft Edge, с какими узлами они могут взаимодействовать, а также ограничивает доступ к среде выполнения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2834">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2835">Если вы не настроите эту политику, для доступных типов расширений и приложений будут отсутствовать какие-либо ограничения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2835">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2836">Расширения и приложения, тип которых не указан в списке, не будут установлены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2836">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2837">В качестве каждого значения должна применяться одна из следующих строк:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2837">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2838">"extension"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2838">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2839">"theme"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2839">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2840">"user_script"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2840">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2841">"hosted_app"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2841">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2842">Дополнительные сведения об этих типах см. в документации по расширениям Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2842">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2843">Примечание. Эта политика также влияет на расширения и приложения, принудительно устанавливаемые с помощью политики [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2843">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2844">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2844">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2845">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2845">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2846">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2846">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2847">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2847">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2848">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2848">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2849">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2849">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2850">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2850">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2851">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2851">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2852">Уникальное имя GP: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2852">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2853">Имя GP: настройка разрешенных типов расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2853">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2854">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2854">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2855">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2855">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2856">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2856">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2857">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2857">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2858">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2858">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2859">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2859">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2860">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2860">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2861">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2861">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2862">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2862">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2863">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2863">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2864">Имя предпочтительного ключа: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2864">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2865">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2865">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2866">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2866">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2867">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2867">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-specific-extensions-to-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2868">Разрешить установку определенных расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2868">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2869">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2869">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2870">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2870">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2871">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2871">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2872">При настройке этой политики указываются расширения, которые не регулируются списком блокировки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2872">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2873">Значение "\*" в списке блокировки означает, что все расширения блокируются и пользователи могут устанавливать только расширения, указанные в списке разрешений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2873">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2874">По умолчанию все расширения разрешены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2874">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2875">Но если вы запретили расширения в политике, вы можете использовать список разрешенных расширений для изменения этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2875">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2876">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2876">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2877">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2878">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2878">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2879">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2880">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2880">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2881">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2881">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2882">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2882">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2883">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2884">Уникальное имя GP: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2884">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2885">Имя GP: разрешить установку определенных расширений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2885">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2886">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2887">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2887">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2888">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2889">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2890">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2891">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2891">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2892">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2892">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2893">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2893">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2894">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2894">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2895">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2896">Имя ключа предпочтения: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2896">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2897">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2898">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2899">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2899">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-cannot-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2900">Определить, какие расширения нельзя установить</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2900">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2901">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2902">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2902">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2903">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2904">Позволяет указать, какие расширения пользователи НЕ МОГУТ установить.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2904">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2905">Установленные расширения будут отключены, если они заблокированы, без возможности их включить.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2905">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2906">После удаления отключенного расширения из списка блокировки оно автоматически будет включено повторно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2906">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2907">Значение списка заблокированных расширений "\*" означает, что все расширения блокируются, если они явно не указаны в списке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2907">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2908">Если эта политика не настроена, пользователь может установить любое расширение в Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2908">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2909">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2909">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2910">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2910">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2911">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2911">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2912">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2912">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2913">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2913">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2914">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2914">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2915">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2915">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2916">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2916">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2917">Уникальное имя GP: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2917">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2918">Имя GP: укажите, какие расширения не могут быть установлены</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2918">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2919">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2919">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2920">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2920">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2921">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2921">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2922">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2922">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2923">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2923">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2924">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2924">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2925">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2925">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2926">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2926">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2927">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2927">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2928">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2928">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2929">Имя предпочтительного ключа: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2929">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2930">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2930">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2931">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2931">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2932">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2932">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-are-installed-silently"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2933">Определить, какие расширения устанавливаются в автоматическом режиме</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2933">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2934">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2934">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2935">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2935">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2936">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2936">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2937">Настройте эту политику, чтобы указать список приложений и расширений, которые устанавливаются без вмешательства пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2937">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2938">Пользователи не могут удалить или отключить этот параметр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2938">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2939">Разрешения предоставляются неявно, в том числе для API расширений enterprise.deviceAttributes и enterprise.platformKeys.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2939">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2940">Примечание. Эти 2 API недоступны для приложений и расширений, которые не установлены принудительно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2940">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2941">Если вы не настроите эту политику, никакие приложения и расширения не будут устанавливаться автоматически, а пользователи смогут удалить приложение в Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2941">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2942">Эта политика заменяет политику [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2942">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2943">Если принудительно установленное приложение или расширение удаляется из этого списка, Microsoft Edge автоматически удалит его.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2943">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2944">В экземплярах Microsoft Windows приложения и расширения, полученные не с веб-сайта надстроек Microsoft Edge, можно принудительно устанавливать только в том случае, если экземпляр присоединен к домену Microsoft Active Directory и используется ОС Windows 10 Pro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2944">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2945">В экземплярах macOS приложения и расширения, полученные не с веб-сайта надстроек Microsoft Edge, можно принудительно устанавливать только в том случае, если экземпляр управляется с помощью MDM или присоединен к домену посредством MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2945">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2946">Исходный код любого расширения может изменяться пользователями с помощью средств разработчика, что может сделать расширение неработоспособным.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2946">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2947">Если вы опасаетесь этой проблемы, настройте политику DeveloperToolsDisabled.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2947">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2948">Каждый элемент списка политики является строкой, содержащей идентификатор расширения и (необязательно) URL-адрес "обновления", отделенный точкой с запятой (;).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2948">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2949">Идентификатор расширения — это 32-буквенная строка, доступная, к примеру, на странице edge://extensions в режиме разработчика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2949">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2950">URL-адрес "обновления" (если он задан) должен указывать на XML-документ манифеста обновления ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2950">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2951">По умолчанию используется URL-адрес обновления веб-сайта надстроек Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2951">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2952">URL-адрес "обновления", заданный в этой политике, используется только для начальной установки; последующие обновления расширения используют URL-адрес обновления из манифеста расширения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2952">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2953">Примечание. Эта политика не применяется к режиму InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2953">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2954">Сведения о размещении расширений см. [здесь](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2954">Read about hosting extensions [here](/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2955">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2955">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2956">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2956">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2957">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2957">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2958">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2958">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2959">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2959">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2960">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2960">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2961">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2961">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2962">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2962">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2963">Уникальное имя GP: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2963">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2964">Имя GP: Контроль над тем, какие расширения устанавливаются без вывода сообщений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2964">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2965">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2965">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2966">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2966">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2967">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2967">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2968">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2968">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2969">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2969">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2970">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2970">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2971">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2971">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2972">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2972">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2973">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2973">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2974">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2974">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2975">Имя предпочтительного ключа: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2975">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2976">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2976">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2977">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2977">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensioninstallsources"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2978">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2978">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-and-user-script-install-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2979">Настроить расширение и исходные тексты для установки пользовательских скриптов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2979">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2980">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2981">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2981">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2982">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2983">Определите URL-адреса, которые могут устанавливать расширения и темы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2983">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2984">Определите URL-адреса, которые могут устанавливать расширения и темы непосредственно без перетаскивания пакетов на страницу edge://extensions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2984">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2985">Каждый элемент в этом списке является шаблоном соответствия стилю расширения (см. [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2985">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2986">Пользователи могут легко устанавливать элементы с любого URL-адреса, соответствующего элементу в этом списке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2986">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2987">Этим шаблонам должно быть разрешено как местоположение файла \*.crx, так и страница, с которой начинается загрузка (другими словами, реферер).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2987">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2988">Не размещайте файлы в расположениях, требующих проверки подлинности.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2988">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-2989">Политика [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) имеет приоритет над этой политикой.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2989">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2990">Любые расширения, которые есть в списке заблокированных, не будут установлены, даже если они получены с сайта в этом списке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2990">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2991">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2991">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2992">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2992">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2993">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2993">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2994">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2994">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2995">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2995">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2996">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2996">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2997">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2997">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-2998">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2998">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-2999">Уникальное имя GP: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-2999">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3000">Имя GP: настройка расширения и источников установки пользовательских скриптов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3000">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3001">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3001">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3002">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3002">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3003">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3003">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3004">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3004">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3005">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3005">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3006">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3006">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3007">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3007">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3008">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3008">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3009">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3009">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3010">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3010">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3011">Имя ключа предпочтения: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3011">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3012">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3012">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3013">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3013">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="extensionsettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3014">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3014">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-management-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3015">Настройка параметров управления расширениями</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3015">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3016">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3016">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3017">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3017">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3018">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3018">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3019">Путем настройки этой политики контролируются параметры управления расширениями для Microsoft Edge, включая любые расширения, управляемые существующими соответствующими политиками.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3019">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3020">Эта политика заменяет все устаревшие политики, которые могли быть настроены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3020">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3021">Эта политика сопоставляет идентификатор расширения или URL-адрес обновления только с определенным параметром.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3021">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3022">Для специального ИД "\*" можно настроить конфигурацию по умолчанию, применяемую ко всем расширениям без настраиваемой конфигурации в этой политике.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3022">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3023">С URL-адресом обновления конфигурация применяется к расширениям с точным URL-адресом обновления, который указан в манифесте расширения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3023">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3024">Дополнительные сведения можно найти в подробном руководстве по политике ExtensionSettings, доступном здесь: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3024">For more details, check out the detailed guide to ExtensionSettings policy available at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161555).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3025">Чтобы заблокировать расширения из определенного магазина стороннего производителя, достаточно заблокировать update_url для этого магазина.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3025">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3026">Например, если вы хотите заблокировать расширения из веб-магазина Chrome, можно использовать следующий JSON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3026">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3027">{"update_url: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx ":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3027">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3028">Обратите внимание, что вы по-прежнему можете использовать [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) и [ExtensionInstallAllowlist,](#extensioninstallallowlist) чтобы разрешить или принудительно установить определенные расширения, даже если хранилище заблокировано с помощью JSON в предыдущем примере.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3028">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3029">Примечание. Для экземпляров Windows, не присоединенных к домену Microsoft Active Directory, принудительная установка ограничена приложениями и расширениями, перечисленными на веб-сайте надстроек Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3029">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3030">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3030">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3031">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3032">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3033">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3034">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3034">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3035">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3035">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3036">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3036">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3037">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3038">Уникальное имя GP: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3038">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3039">Имя GP: Настройка параметров управления расширениями</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3039">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3040">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3041">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3042">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3043">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3044">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3045">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3046">Имя значения: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3046">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3047">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3047">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3048">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3048">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ],
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads",
      "bookmarks"
    ],
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "blocked",
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ],
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  },
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "allowed",
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  },
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "force_installed",
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ],
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ],
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  },
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  },
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.",
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  },
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.",
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  },
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ],
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ],
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3049">Компактный пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3049">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3050">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3050">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3051">Имя предпочтительного ключа: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3051">Preference Key Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3052">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3052">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ExtensionSettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>*</key>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>hosted_app</string>
    </array>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom error message.</string>
    <key>blocked_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>downloads</string>
      <string>bookmarks</string>
    </array>
    <key>install_sources</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://company-intranet/apps</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>blocked</string>
    <key>runtime_allowed_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://good.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>runtime_blocked_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://*.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
  <key>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>history</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>allowed</string>
    <key>minimum_version_required</key>
    <string>1.0.1</string>
  </dict>
  <key>bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa</key>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>downloads</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>force_installed</string>
    <key>runtime_allowed_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://good.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>runtime_blocked_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://*.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>update_url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com/update_url</string>
  </dict>
  <key>cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom error message.</string>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>blocked</string>
  </dict>
  <key>defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom error message.</string>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>blocked</string>
  </dict>
  <key>fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom removal message.</string>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>removed</string>
  </dict>
  <key>update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml</key>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>downloads</string>
    </array>
    <key>blocked_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>wallpaper</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>allowed</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```
