  ## <a name="http-authentication-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3054">Политики проверки подлинности HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3054">HTTP authentication policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3055">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3055">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="allowcrossoriginauthprompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3056">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3056">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cross-origin-http-authentication-prompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3057">Разрешение запросов на проверку подлинности в нескольких источниках</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3057">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3058">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3058">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3059">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3059">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3060">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3060">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3061">Определяет, могут ли на странице выводится запрос на проверку подлинности сторонних изображений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3061">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3062">Как правило, это отключено в качестве защиты от фишинга.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3062">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3063">Если эта политика не настроена, это означает, что она отключена, а сторонние изображения не могут выводить запрос на проверку подлинности.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3063">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3064">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3064">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3065">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3065">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3066">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3066">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3067">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3067">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3068">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3068">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3069">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3069">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3070">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3070">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3071">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3071">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3072">Уникальное имя GP: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3072">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3073">Имя GP: Разрешение запросов на проверку подлинности в нескольких источниках</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3073">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3074">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3074">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3075">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3075">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3076">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3076">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3077">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3077">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3078">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3078">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3079">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3079">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3080">Имя значения: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3080">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3081">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3081">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3082">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3082">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3083">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3083">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3084">Имя ключа предпочтения: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3084">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3085">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3085">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3086">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3086">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="authnegotiatedelegateallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3087">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3087">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-a-list-of-servers-that-microsoft-edge-can-delegate-user-credentials-to"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3088">Указывает список серверов, которым Microsoft Edge может делегировать учетные данные пользователя</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3088">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3089">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3089">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3090">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3090">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3091">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3091">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3092">Настройте список серверов, которым Microsoft Edge может делегировать.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3092">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3093">Разделите несколько имен серверов запятыми.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3093">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3094">Подстановочные знаки (\*) разрешены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3094">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3095">Если вы не настроите эту политику, Microsoft Edge не будет делегировать учетные данные пользователя, даже если сервер обнаружен как интрасеть.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3095">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3096">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3096">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3097">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3097">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3098">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3098">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3099">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3099">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3100">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3100">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3101">Строка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3101">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3102">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3102">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3103">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3103">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3104">Уникальное имя GP: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3104">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3105">Имя GP: указывает список серверов, которым Microsoft Edge может делегировать учетные данные пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3105">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3106">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3106">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3107">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3107">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3108">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3108">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3109">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3109">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3110">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3110">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3111">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3111">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3112">Имя значения: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3112">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3113">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3113">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3114">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3114">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3115">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3115">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3116">Имя ключа предпочтения: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3116">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3117">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3117">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3118">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3118">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="authschemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3119">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3119">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-authentication-schemes"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3120">Поддерживаемые схемы аутентификации</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3120">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3121">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3121">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3122">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3122">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3123">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3123">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3124">Указывает, какие схемы аутентификации HTTP поддерживаются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3124">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3125">Вы можете настроить политику, используя следующие значения: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', и 'negotiate'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3125">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3126">Разделите несколько значений запятыми.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3126">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3127">Если вы не настроите эту политику, будут использованы все четыре схемы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3127">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3128">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3128">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3129">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3129">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3130">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3130">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3131">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3131">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3132">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3132">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3133">Строка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3133">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3134">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3134">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3135">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3135">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3136">Уникальное имя GP: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3136">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3137">Имя GP: Поддерживаемые схемы аутентификации</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3137">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3138">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3138">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3139">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3139">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3140">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3140">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3141">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3141">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3142">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3142">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3143">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3143">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3144">Имя значения: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3144">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3145">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3145">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3146">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3146">Example value:</span></span>

```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3147">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3147">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3148">Имя ключа предпочтения: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3148">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3149">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3149">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3150">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3150">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="authserverallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3151">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3151">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-allowed-authentication-servers"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3152">Настроить список разрешенных серверов аутентификации</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3152">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3153">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3153">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3154">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3154">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3155">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3155">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3156">Указывает, какие серверы включить для встроенной аутентификации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3156">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3157">Интегрированная аутентификация включается только тогда, когда Microsoft Edge получает запрос аутентификации от прокси-сервера или с сервера в этом списке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3157">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3158">Разделите несколько имен серверов запятыми.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3158">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3159">Подстановочные знаки (\*) разрешены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3159">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3160">Если вы не настроите эту политику, Microsoft Edge попытается определить, находится ли сервер в интрасети - только тогда он будет отвечать на запросы IWA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3160">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3161">Если сервер находится в Интернете, запросы IWA от него игнорируются Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3161">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3162">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3162">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3163">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3163">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3164">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3164">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3165">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3165">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3166">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3166">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3167">Строка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3167">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3168">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3168">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3169">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3169">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3170">Уникальное имя GP: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3170">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3171">Имя GP: Настройка списка разрешенных серверов аутентификации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3171">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3172">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3172">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3173">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3173">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3174">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3174">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3175">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3175">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3176">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3176">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3177">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3177">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3178">Имя значения: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3178">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3179">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3179">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3180">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3180">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3181">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3181">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3182">Имя ключа предпочтения: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3182">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3183">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3183">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3184">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3184">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="basicauthoverhttpenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3185">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3185">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-basic-authentication-for-http"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3186">Разрешить базовую проверку подлинности для HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3186">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3187">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3187">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3188">На Windows и macOS начиная с 88 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3188">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3189">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3189">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3190">Если включить эту политику или оставить ее неустановленной, будут разрешены основные задачи проверки подлинности, полученные посредством небезопасной проверке подлинности HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3190">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3191">Если эта политика отключена, небезопасные HTTP-запросы из схемы базовой проверки подлинности блокируются и разрешен только безопасный протокол HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3191">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3192">Этот параметр политики игнорируется (и базовая проверка подлинности всегда запрещена), если политика [AuthSchemes](#authschemes) задана и не включает базовую проверку подлинности.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3192">This policy setting is ignored (and Basic is always forbidden) if the [AuthSchemes](#authschemes) policy is set and does not include Basic.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3193">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3193">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3194">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3194">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3195">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3195">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3196">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3196">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3197">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3197">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3198">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3198">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3199">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3199">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3200">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3200">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3201">Уникальное имя GP: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3201">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3202">Имя GP: Разрешить базовую проверку подлинности для HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3202">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3203">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3203">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3204">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3204">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3205">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3205">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3206">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3206">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3207">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3207">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3208">Путь (рекомендуется): Н/Д</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3208">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3209">Имя значения: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3209">Value Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3210">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3210">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3211">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3211">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3212">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3212">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3213">Имя ключа предпочтения: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3213">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3214">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3214">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3215">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3215">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="disableauthnegotiatecnamelookup"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3216">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3216">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-cname-lookup-when-negotiating-kerberos-authentication"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3217">Отключить поиск CNAME при согласовании проверки подлинности Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3217">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3218">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3218">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3219">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3219">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3220">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3220">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3221">Определяет, основано ли созданное имя участника службы Kerberos на каноническом имени DNS (CNAME) или на введенном исходном имени.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3221">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3222">Если вы включите эту политику, поиск CNAME будет пропущен, а имя сервера (в том виде, в котором оно введено) используется.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3222">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3223">Если вы отключите эту политику или не настроите ее, используется каноническое имя сервера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3223">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3224">Это определяется с помощью поиска CNAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3224">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3225">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3225">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3226">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3226">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3227">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3227">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3228">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3228">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3229">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3229">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3230">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3230">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3231">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3231">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3232">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3232">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3233">Уникальное имя GP: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3233">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3234">Имя GP: отключить поиск CNAME при согласовании аутентификации Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3234">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3235">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3235">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3236">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3236">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3237">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3237">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3238">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3238">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3239">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3239">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3240">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3240">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3241">Имя значения: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3241">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3242">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3242">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3243">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3243">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3244">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3244">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3245">Имя ключа предпочтения: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3245">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3246">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3246">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3247">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3247">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="enableauthnegotiateport"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3248">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3248">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <a name="include-non-standard-port-in-kerberos-spn"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3249">Включить нестандартный порт в Kerberos SPN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3249">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3250">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3250">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3251">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3251">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3252">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3252">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3253">Указывает, должен ли созданный SPN Kerberos включать нестандартный порт.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3253">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3254">Если вы включите эту политику, и пользователь включит в URL нестандартный порт (порт, отличный от 80 или 443), этот порт будет включен в созданное имя участника службы Kerberos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3254">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3255">Если вы не настроите или не отключите эту политику, сгенерированное имя Kerberos SPN не будет включать порт в любом случае.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3255">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3256">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3256">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3257">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3257">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3258">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3258">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3259">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3259">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3260">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3260">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3261">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3261">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3262">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3262">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3263">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3263">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3264">Уникальное имя GP: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3264">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3265">Имя GP: Включить нестандартный порт в Kerberos SPN.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3265">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3266">Путь к GP (обязательно): административные шаблоны / Microsoft Edge / HTTP-аутентификация</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3266">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3267">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3267">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3268">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3268">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3269">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3269">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3270">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3270">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3271">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3271">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3272">Имя значения: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3272">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3273">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3273">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3274">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3274">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3275">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3275">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3276">Имя ключа предпочтения: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3276">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3277">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3277">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3278">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3278">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="ntlmv2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3279">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3279">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-whether-ntlmv2-authentication-is-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3280">Проверьте, включена ли аутентификация NTLMv2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3280">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3281">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3281">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3282">MacOS с 77 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3282">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3283">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3283">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3284">Управляет включением NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3284">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3285">Все последние версии серверов Samba и Windows поддерживают NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3285">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3286">Вы должны отключить NTLMv2 только для решения проблем с обратной совместимостью, поскольку это снижает безопасность аутентификации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3286">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3287">Если вы не настроите эту политику, NTLMv2 включен по умолчанию.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3287">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3288">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3288">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3289">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3289">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3290">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3290">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3291">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3291">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3292">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3292">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3293">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3293">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3294">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3295">Имя ключа предпочтения: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3295">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3296">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3296">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3297">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3297">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="windowshelloforhttpauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3298">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3298">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-hello-for-http-auth-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3299">Функция Windows Hello для проверки подлинности HTTP включена</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3299">Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3300">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3300">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3301">В Windows 90 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3301">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3302">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3302">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3303">Указывает, следует ли использовать пользовательский интерфейс учетных данных Windows для ответа на запросы проверки подлинности NTLM и Negotiate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3303">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3304">Если вы отключите эту политику, для ответа на запросы NTLM и Negotiate будут использоваться основное имя пользователя и пароль.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3304">If you disable this policy, a basic username and password prompt will be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate challenges.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3305">Если включить или не настраивать эту политику, будет использоваться пользовательский интерфейс учетных данных Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3305">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Windows Credential UI will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3306">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3306">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3307">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3307">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3308">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3308">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3309">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3309">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3310">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3310">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3311">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3311">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3312">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3312">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3313">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3313">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3314">Уникальное имя GP: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3314">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3315">Название GP: Функция Windows Hello для проверки подлинности HTTP включена</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3315">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3316">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Проверка подлинности HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3316">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3317">Путь к GP (рекомендуется): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge - Настройки по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределить)/Проверка подлинности HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3317">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3318">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3318">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3319">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3319">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3320">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3320">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3321">Путь (рекомендуется): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3321">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3322">Имя значения: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3322">Value Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3323">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3323">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3324">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3324">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="kiosk-mode-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3326">Политики режима полного экрана</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3326">Kiosk Mode settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3327">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3327">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="kioskaddressbareditingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3328">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3328">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-bar-editing-for-kiosk-mode-public-browsing-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3329">Настройка редактирования в адресной строке для общедоступного просмотра в режиме терминала</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3329">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3330">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3330">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3331">На Windows и macOS начиная с 87 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3331">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3332">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3332">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3333">Эта политика применима только к режиму терминала в Microsoft Edge при использовании общедоступного просмотра.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3333">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3334">Если вы включите или не настроите эту политику, пользователи смогут изменить URL-адрес в адресной строке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3334">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3335">Если вы отключите эту политику, пользователи не смогут изменить URL-адрес в адресной строке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3335">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3336">Подробнее о настройке режима терминала см. в статье [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3336">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3337">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3337">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3338">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3338">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3339">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3339">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3340">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3340">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3341">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3341">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3342">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3342">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3343">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3343">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3344">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3344">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3345">Уникальное имя групповой политики: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3345">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3346">Имя групповой политики: Настройка редактирования в адресной строке для общедоступного просмотра в режиме терминала</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3346">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3347">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки режима полного экрана</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3347">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3348">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3348">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3349">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3349">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3350">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3350">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3351">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3351">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3352">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3352">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3353">Имя значения: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3353">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3354">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3354">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3355">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3355">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3356">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3356">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3357">Имя ключа настройки: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3357">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3358">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3358">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3359">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3359">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="kioskdeletedownloadsonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3360">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3360">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-files-downloaded-as-part-of-kiosk-session-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3361">Удалять файлы, загруженные в сеансе полного экрана, при закрытии Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3361">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3362">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3362">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3363">В Windows 87 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3363">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3364">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3364">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3365">Эта политика применяется только к Microsoft Edge в режиме полного экрана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3365">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3366">Если включить эту политику, файлы, загруженные в сеансе полного экрана, будут удаляться каждый раз при закрытии Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3366">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3367">Если выключить эту политику или не настроить ее, файлы, загруженные в сеансе полного экрана, не будут удаляться при закрытии Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3367">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3368">Дополнительно о настройке режима полного экрана см. [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3368">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3369">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3369">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3370">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3370">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3371">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3371">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3372">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3372">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3373">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3373">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3374">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3374">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3375">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3375">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3376">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3376">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3377">Уникальное имя GP: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3377">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3378">Имя GP: Удалять файлы, загруженные в сеансе полного экрана, при закрытии Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3378">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3379">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки режима полного экрана</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3379">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3380">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3380">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3381">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3381">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3382">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3382">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3383">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3383">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3384">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3384">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3385">Имя значения: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3385">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3386">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3386">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3387">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3387">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="manageability-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3389">Политики управляемости</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3389">Manageability policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3390">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3390">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="mamenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3391">MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3391">MAMEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="mobile-app-management-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3392">Управление мобильными приложениями включено</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3392">Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3393">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3393">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3394">В Windows и macOS с версии 89 или более поздней</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3394">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3395">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3395">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3396">Позволяет браузеру Microsoft Edge получать политики из служб управления приложениями Intune и применять их к профилям пользователей.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3396">Allows the Microsoft Edge browser to retrieve policies from the Intune application management services and apply them to users' profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3397">Если включить эту политику или не настроить ее, можно применять политики управления мобильными приложениями (MAM).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3397">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Mobile App Management (MAM) Policies can be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3398">Если отключить эту политику, Microsoft Edge не будет связываться с Intune для запроса политик MAM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3398">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not communicate with Intune to request MAM Policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3399">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3399">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3400">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3400">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3401">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3401">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3402">Обновление динамической политики: Нет - требуется перезапуск браузера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3402">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3403">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3403">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3404">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3404">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3405">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3405">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3406">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3406">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3407">Уникальное имя групповой политики: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3407">GP unique name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3408">Имя групповой политики: управление мобильными приложениями включено</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3408">GP name: Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3409">Путь к групповой политике (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Управляемость</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3409">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3410">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3410">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3411">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3411">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3412">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3412">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3413">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3413">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3414">Путь (рекомендуется): Н/Д</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3414">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3415">Имя значения: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3415">Value Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3416">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3416">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3417">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3417">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3418">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3418">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3419">Имя ключа предпочтения: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3419">Preference Key Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3420">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3420">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3421">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3421">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="native-messaging-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3422">Собственные политики обмена сообщениями</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3422">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3423">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3423">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3424">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3424">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-native-messaging-hosts-users-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3425">Контроль, какие нативные хосты обмена сообщениями могут использовать пользователи</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3425">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3426">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3426">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3427">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3427">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3428">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3428">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3429">Путем настройки политики указывается, какие узлы собственного обмена сообщениями не регулируются списком запрещений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3429">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3430">Значение "\*" в списке запрещений означает, что все узлы собственного обмена сообщениями запрещены, если они не разрешены явным образом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3430">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3431">По умолчанию разрешены все узлы собственного обмена сообщениями.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3431">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3432">Но если политика запрещает узел собственного обмена сообщениями, администратор может использовать список разрешений для изменения этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3432">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3433">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3433">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3434">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3434">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3435">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3435">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
