<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3778">Пропуск поля означает, что все значения совпадают; например, если вы не укажете возможность подключения, предварительный просмотр печати начнет обнаруживать все виды локальных принтеров.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3778">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3779">Шаблоны регулярных выражений должны соответствовать синтаксису JavaScript RegExp, а совпадения чувствительны к регистру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3779">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3780">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3780">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3781">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3781">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3782">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3782">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3783">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3783">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3784">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3784">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3785">Строка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3785">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3786">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3786">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3787">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3787">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3788">Уникальное имя GP: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3788">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3789">Имя GP: Правила выбора принтера по умолчанию</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3789">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3790">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3790">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3791">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3791">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3792">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3792">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3793">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3793">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3794">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3794">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3795">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3795">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3796">Имя значения: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3796">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3797">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3797">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3798">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3798">Example value:</span></span>

```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3799">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3799">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3800">Имя ключа предпочтения: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3800">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3801">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3801">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3802">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3802">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printheaderfooter"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3803">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3803">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-headers-and-footers"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3804">Верхние и нижние колонтитулы печати</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3804">Print headers and footers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3805">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3805">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3806">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3806">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3807">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3807">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3808">Принудительно включить или отключить «верхние и нижние колонтитулы» в диалоговом окне печати.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3808">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3809">Если вы не настроите эту политику, пользователи могут решить, печатать ли верхние и нижние колонтитулы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3809">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3810">Если вы отключите эту политику, пользователи не смогут печатать верхние и нижние колонтитулы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3810">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3811">Если вы включите эту политику, пользователи всегда будут печатать верхние и нижние колонтитулы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3811">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3812">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3812">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3813">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3813">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3814">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3814">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3815">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3815">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3816">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3816">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3817">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3817">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3818">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3818">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3819">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3819">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3820">Уникальное имя GP: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3820">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3821">Название GP: Верхние и нижние колонтитулы печати</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3821">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3822">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3822">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3823">Путь к GP (рекомендуется): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge - Настройки по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределить)/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3823">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3824">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3824">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3825">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3825">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3826">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3826">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3827">Путь (рекомендуется): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3827">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3828">Имя значения: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3828">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3829">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3829">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3830">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3830">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3831">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3831">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3832">Имя предпочтительного ключа: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3832">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3833">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3833">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3834">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3834">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printpreviewusesystemdefaultprinter"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3835">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3835">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-system-default-printer-as-the-default-printer"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3836">Установите системный принтер по умолчанию в качестве принтера по умолчанию</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3836">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3837">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3837">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3838">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3838">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3839">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3839">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3840">Указывает Microsoft Edge использовать системный принтер по умолчанию в качестве выбора по умолчанию в режиме предварительного просмотра вместо последнего использованного принтера.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3840">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3841">Если вы отключите эту политику или не настроите ее, в режиме предварительного просмотра в качестве пункта назначения по умолчанию будет использоваться последний использованный принтер.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3841">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3842">Если вы включите эту политику, в окне предварительного просмотра будет использоваться принтер по умолчанию для операционной системы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3842">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3843">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3844">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3845">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3845">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3846">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3847">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3848">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3848">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3849">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3850">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3851">Уникальное имя GP: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3851">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3852">Имя GP: Установите системный принтер по умолчанию в качестве принтера по умолчанию</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3852">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3853">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3854">Путь к GP (рекомендуется): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge - Настройки по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределить)/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3854">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3855">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3856">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3857">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3858">Путь (рекомендуется): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3858">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3859">Имя значения: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3859">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3860">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3860">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3861">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3861">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3862">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3862">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3863">Имя предпочтительного ключа: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3863">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3864">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3864">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3865">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3865">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printrasterizationmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3866">PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3866">PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-rasterization-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3867">Режим растеризации печати</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3867">Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3868">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3869">В Windows 90 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3869">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3870">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3871">Управление способом печати Microsoft Edge в Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3871">Controls how Microsoft Edge prints on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3872">При печати в Windows на принтере без поддержки PostScript иногда для правильной печати необходимо растеризовать задания печати.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3872">When printing to a non-PostScript printer on Windows, sometimes print jobs need to be rasterized to print correctly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3873">Если присвоить этой политике значение "Полная" или не настроить ее, Microsoft Edge при необходимости будет выполнять полную растеризацию страницы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3873">If you set this policy to 'Full' or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will do full page rasterization if necessary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3874">Если присвоить этой политике значение "Быстрая", Microsoft Edge сократит объем растеризации, что позволит уменьшить размеры задания печати и увеличить скорость печати.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3874">If you set this policy to 'Fast', Microsoft Edge will reduce the amount of rasterization which can help reduce print job sizes and increase printing speed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3875">Сопоставление параметров политики:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3875">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3876">Полная (0) = полная растеризация страницы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3876">Full (0) = Full page rasterization</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3877">Быстрая (1) = отказ от растеризации по возможности</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3877">Fast (1) = Avoid rasterization if possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3878">Используйте изложенные выше сведения при настройке этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3878">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3879">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3879">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3880">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3880">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3881">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3881">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3882">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3882">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3883">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3883">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3884">целое число</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3884">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3885">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3885">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3886">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3886">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3887">Уникальное имя групповой политики: PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3887">GP unique name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3888">Имя групповой политики: режим растеризации печати</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3888">GP name: Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3889">Путь к групповой политике (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3889">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3890">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3890">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3891">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3891">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3892">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3892">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3893">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3893">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3894">Путь (рекомендуется): Н/Д</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3894">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3895">Имя значения: PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3895">Value Name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3896">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3896">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3897">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3897">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3898">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printertypedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3899">PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3899">PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-printer-types-on-the-deny-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3900">Отключить типы принтеров из списка запрещенных</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3900">Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3901">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3902">На Windows и macOS начиная с 88 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3902">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3903">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3904">Типы принтеров из списка запрещенных не будут обнаружены, и их возможности не будут получены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3904">The printer types on the deny list won't be discovered or have their capabilities fetched.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3905">Если вы помещаете все типы принтеров в список запрещенных, печать будет отключена, так как для документов не указано назначение печати.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3905">Placing all printer types on the deny list effectively disables printing, because there's no print destination for documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3906">Если эта политика не настроена или список принтеров пуст, все типы принтеров доступны для обнаружения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3906">If you don't configure this policy, or the printer list is empty, all printer types are discoverable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3907">Назначения принтеров включают принтеры расширения и локальные принтеры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3907">Printer destinations include extension printers and local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3908">Принтеры расширения также называются назначениями поставщика печати и включают любое назначение, относящееся к расширению Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3908">Extension printers are also known as print provider destinations, and include any destination that belongs to a Microsoft Edge extension.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3909">Локальные принтеры также называются собственными назначениями печати и включают назначения, доступные для локального компьютера и общих сетевых принтеров.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3909">Local printers are also known as native printing destinations, and include destinations available to the local machine and shared network printers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3910">Сопоставление параметров политики:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3910">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3911">privet (privet) = назначения протокола на основе Zeroconf (mDNS + DNS-SD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3911">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-based (mDNS + DNS-SD) protocol destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3912">extension (extension) = назначения на основе расширения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3912">extension (extension) = Extension-based destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3913">pdf (pdf) = назначение "Сохранить как PDF"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3913">pdf (pdf) = The 'Save as PDF' destination</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3914">local (local) = назначения локальных принтеров</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3914">local (local) = Local printer destinations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3915">Используйте изложенные выше сведения при настройке этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3915">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3916">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3916">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3917">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3917">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3918">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3918">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3919">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3919">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3920">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3920">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3921">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3921">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3922">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3922">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3923">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3923">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3924">Уникальное имя GP: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3924">GP unique name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3925">Имя GP: отключить типы принтеров из списка запрещенных</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3925">GP name: Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3926">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3926">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3927">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3927">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3928">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3928">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3929">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3929">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3930">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3930">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3931">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3931">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3932">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3932">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3933">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3933">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3934">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3934">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\1 = "local"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\2 = "privet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3935">Сведения о Mac и параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3935">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3936">Имя ключа настройки: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3936">Preference Key Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3937">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3937">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>local</string>
  <string>privet</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="printingallowedbackgroundgraphicsmodes"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3939">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3939">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3940">Ограничение режима печати фона</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3940">Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3941">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3941">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3942">В Windows и macOS с версии 89 или более поздней</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3942">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3943">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3943">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3944">Ограничивает режим печати фона.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3944">Restricts background graphics printing mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3945">Если эта политика не настроена, ограничения на печать фона отсутствуют.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3945">If this policy isn't set there's no restriction on printing background graphics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3946">Сопоставление параметров политики:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3946">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3947">любой (любой) = разрешить печать с фоном и без него</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3947">any (any) = Allow printing with and without background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3948">включено (включено) = разрешить печать только с фоном</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3948">enabled (enabled) = Allow printing only with background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3949">отключено (отключено) = разрешить печать только без фона</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3949">disabled (disabled) = Allow printing only without background graphics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-3950">Используйте изложенные выше сведения при настройке этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3950">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3951">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3951">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3952">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3952">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3953">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3953">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3954">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3954">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3955">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3955">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3956">Строка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3956">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3957">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3957">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3958">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3958">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3959">Уникальное имя групповой политики: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3959">GP unique name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3960">Имя групповой политики: ограничение режима печати фона</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3960">GP name: Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3961">Путь к групповой политике (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Печать</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3961">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3962">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3962">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3963">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3963">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3964">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3964">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3965">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3965">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3966">Путь (рекомендуется): Н/Д</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3966">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3967">Имя значения: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3967">Value Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3968">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3968">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3969">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3969">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-3970">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3970">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3971">Имя ключа предпочтения: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3971">Preference Key Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-3972">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-3972">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```
