  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4339">Строка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4339">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4340">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4340">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4341">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4342">Уникальное имя групповой политики: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4342">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4343">Имя GP: Настройка адреса или URL прокси-сервера (устарело)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4343">GP name: Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4344">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Прокси-сервер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4345">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4345">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4346">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4347">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4348">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4349">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4349">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4350">Имя значения: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4350">Value Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4351">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4351">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4352">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4352">Example value:</span></span>

```
"123.123.123.123:8080"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4353">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4353">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4354">Имя предпочтительного ключа: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4354">Preference Key Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4355">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4355">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4356">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4356">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="proxysettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4357">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4357">ProxySettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="proxy-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4358">Параметры прокси-сервера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4358">Proxy settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4359">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4359">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4360">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4360">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4361">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4361">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4362">Настраивает параметры прокси для Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4362">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4363">Если вы включите эту политику, Microsoft Edge будет игнорировать все параметры, связанные с прокси, указанные в командной строке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4363">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4364">Если вы не настроите эту политику, пользователи могут выбрать свои собственные настройки прокси.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4364">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4365">Эта политика переопределяет следующие отдельные политики:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4365">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4366">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4366">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4367">Настройка политики [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) допускает указанные ниже поля.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4367">Setting the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy accepts the following fields:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4368">ProxyMode, который позволяет указать прокси-сервер, используемый Microsoft Edge, и запрещает пользователям менять параметры прокси</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4368">ProxyMode, which lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4369">ProxyPacUrl – URL-адрес файла .pac прокси-сервера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4369">ProxyPacUrl, a URL to a proxy .pac file</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4370">ProxyServer – URL-адрес прокси-сервера</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4370">ProxyServer, a URL for the proxy server</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4371">ProxyBypassList – список прокси-хостов, которые обходит Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4371">ProxyBypassList, a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4372">Для ProxyMode, выбрано значение:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4372">For ProxyMode, if you choose the value:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4373">direct – прокси-сервер никогда не используется, а все остальные поля игнорируются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4373">direct, a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4374">system – используется системный прокси-сервер, а все остальные поля игнорируются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4374">system, the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4375">auto_detect — все остальные поля игнорируются.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4375">auto_detect, all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4376">fixed_servers — используются поля ProxyServer и ProxyBypassList.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4376">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4377">pac_script — используются поля ProxyPacUrl и ProxyBypassList.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4377">pac_script, the ProxyPacUrl and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4378">Для более подробных примеров перейдите по ссылке [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4378">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4379">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4379">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4380">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4380">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4381">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4381">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4382">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4382">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4383">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4383">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4384">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4384">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4385">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4385">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4386">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4386">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4387">Уникальное имя GP: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4387">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4388">Название GP: Настройки прокси</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4388">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4389">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Прокси-сервер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4389">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4390">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4390">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4391">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4391">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4392">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4392">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4393">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4393">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4394">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4394">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4395">Имя значения: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4395">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4396">Тип значения: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4396">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4397">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4397">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/",
  "ProxyMode": "pac_script",
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac",
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4398">Компактный пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4398">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {"ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", "ProxyMode": "pac_script", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4399">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4399">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4400">Имя ключа предпочтения: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4400">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4401">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4401">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>pac_script</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4402">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4402">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="sleeping-tabs-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4403">Политики параметров настройки вкладок для сна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4403">Sleeping tabs settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4404">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4404">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4405">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4405">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-sleeping-tabs-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4406">Блокировка вкладок для сна на определенных сайтах</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4406">Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4407">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4407">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4408">На Windows и macOS начиная с 88 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4408">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4409">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4409">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4410">Определите список сайтов в соответствии с шаблонами URL-адресов, которым не разрешено переходить в спящий режим с помощью спящих вкладок.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4410">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are not allowed to be put to sleep by sleeping tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4411">Если политика [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) отключена, этот список не используется, и сайты не будут автоматически переведены в спящий режим.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4411">If the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is disabled, this list is not used and no sites will be put to sleep automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4412">Если не настроить эту политику, все сайты будут иметь право на переход в спящий режим, если они не заблокированы в личной конфигурации пользователя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4412">If you don't configure this policy, all sites will be eligible to be put to sleep unless the user's personal configuration blocks them.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4413">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4413">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4414">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4414">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4415">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4415">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4416">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4416">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4417">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4417">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4418">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4418">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4419">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4419">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4420">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4420">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4421">Уникальное имя GP: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4421">GP unique name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4422">Имя GP: Блокировка спящих вкладок на определенных сайтах</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4422">GP name: Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4423">Путь к GP (обязательно): Параметры административных шаблонов/Microsoft Edge/спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4423">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4424">Путь GP (рекомендуется): Параметры административных шаблонов/Microsoft Edge — параметры по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределять)/спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4424">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4425">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4425">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4426">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4426">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4427">Путь (обязательно): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4427">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4428">Путь (рекомендуется): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4428">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4429">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3,...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4429">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4430">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4430">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4431">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4431">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4432">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4432">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4433">Имя ключа предпочтения: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4433">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4434">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4434">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4435">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4435">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4436">SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4436">SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4437">Настройка вкладок для сна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4437">Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4438">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4438">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4439">На Windows и macOS начиная с 88 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4439">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4440">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4440">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4441">Этот параметр политики позволяет указать, следует ли включить спящие вкладки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4441">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on sleeping tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4442">Вкладки в спящем режиме сокращают использование ЦП, батареи и памяти путем перевода вкладок заднего плана бездействия в спящий режим.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4442">Sleeping tabs reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage by putting idle background tabs to sleep.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4443">Microsoft Edge использует эвристику, чтобы избежать перевода в спящий режим вкладок, которые выполняют полезную работу в фоновом режиме, например, отображают уведомления, воспроизводят звук и транслируют видео.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4443">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid putting tabs to sleep that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4444">По умолчанию спящие вкладки включены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4444">By default, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4445">Некоторые сайты могут быть заблокированы от перевода в режим сна с помощью настройки политики [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4445">Individual sites may be blocked from being put to sleep by configuring the policy [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4446">Если этот параметр включен, спящие вкладки включены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4446">If you enable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4447">Если этот параметр отключен, спящие вкладки отключены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4447">If you disable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4448">Если не настроить этот параметр, пользователи смогут выбирать, следует ли использовать спящие вкладки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4448">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use sleeping tabs.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4449">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4449">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4450">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4450">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4451">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4451">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4452">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4452">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4453">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4453">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4454">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4454">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4455">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4455">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4456">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4456">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4457">Уникальное имя GP: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4457">GP unique name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4458">Имя GP: Настройка спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4458">GP name: Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4459">Путь к GP (обязательно): Параметры административных шаблонов/Microsoft Edge/спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4459">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4460">Путь GP (рекомендуется): Параметры административных шаблонов/Microsoft Edge — параметры по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределять)/спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4460">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4461">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4461">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4462">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4462">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4463">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4463">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4464">Путь (рекомендуется): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4464">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4465">Имя значения: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4465">Value Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4466">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4466">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4467">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4467">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4468">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4468">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4469">Имя ключа предпочтения: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4469">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4470">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4470">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4471">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4471">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabstimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4472">SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4472">SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-background-tab-inactivity-timeout-for-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4473">Настройка времени бездействия фоновой вкладки для вкладки в режиме сна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4473">Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4474">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4474">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4475">На Windows и macOS начиная с 88 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4475">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4476">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4476">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4477">Этот параметр политики позволяет настроить время ожидания в секундах, после чего неактивные вкладки фона будут автоматически переведены в спящий режим при включенной функции спящих вкладок.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4477">This policy setting lets you configure the timeout, in seconds, after which inactive background tabs will be automatically put to sleep if sleeping tabs is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4478">По умолчанию это время ожидания составляет 7 200 секунд (2 часа).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4478">By default, this timeout is 7,200 seconds (2 hours).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4479">Вкладки переводятся в спящий режим автоматически, если политика [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) включена или не настроена, а пользователь включил параметр спящих вкладок.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4479">Tabs are only put to sleep automatically when the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is enabled or is not configured and the user has enabled the sleeping tabs setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4480">Если не настроить эту политику, пользователи смогут выбрать значение времени ожидания.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4480">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose the timeout value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4481">Сопоставление параметров политики:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4481">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4482">5Minutes (300) = 5 минут бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4482">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4483">15Minutes (900) = 15 минут бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4483">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4484">30Minutes (1800) = 30 минут бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4484">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4485">1Hour (3600) = 1 час бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4485">1Hour (3600) = 1 hour of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4486">2Hours (7200) = 2 часа бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4486">2Hours (7200) = 2 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4487">3Hours (10800) = 3 часа бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4487">3Hours (10800) = 3 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4488">6Hours (21600) = 6 часов бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4488">6Hours (21600) = 6 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4489">12Hours (43200) = 12 часов бездействия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4489">12Hours (43200) = 12 hours of inactivity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4490">Используйте изложенные выше сведения при настройке этой политики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4490">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4491">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4491">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4492">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4492">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4493">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4493">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4494">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4494">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4495">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4495">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4496">целое число</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4496">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4497">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4497">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4498">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4498">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4499">Уникальное имя GP: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4499">GP unique name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4500">Имя GP: Настройка время ожидания активности для фоновых вкладок на спящих вкладках</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4500">GP name: Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4501">Путь к GP (обязательно): Параметры административных шаблонов/Microsoft Edge/спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4501">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4502">Путь GP (рекомендуется): Параметры административных шаблонов/Microsoft Edge — параметры по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределять)/спящих вкладок</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4502">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4503">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4503">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4504">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4504">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4505">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4505">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4506">Путь (рекомендуется): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4506">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4507">Имя значения: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4507">Value Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4508">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4508">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4509">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4509">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000384
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4510">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4510">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4511">Имя ключа предпочтения: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4511">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4512">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4512">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>900</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4513">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4513">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <a name="smartscreen-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4514">Политики настроек SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4514">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4515">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4515">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4516">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4516">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-prompts-for-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4517">Запретить обходить запросы фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender для сайтов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4517">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4518">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4518">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4519">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4519">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4520">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4520">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4521">Этот параметр политики позволяет вам решить, могут ли пользователи переопределять предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender о потенциально вредоносных веб-сайтах.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4521">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4522">Если вы включите этот параметр, пользователи не смогут игнорировать предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender, и им будет запрещено посещать сайт.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4522">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4523">Если этот параметр отключен или не настроен, пользователи могут игнорировать предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender и переходить на сайт.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4523">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4524">Эта политика доступна только для экземпляров Windows, присоединенных к домену Microsoft Active Directory, экземпляров Windows 10 Pro или Корпоративная, зарегистрированных для управления устройством, или экземпляров macOS, управляемых с помощью MDM или присоединенных к домену посредством MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4524">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4525">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4525">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4526">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4526">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4527">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4527">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4528">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4528">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4529">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4529">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4530">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4530">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4531">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4531">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4532">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4532">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4533">Уникальное имя GP: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4533">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4534">Имя GP: Предотвращение обхода запросов фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender для сайтов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4534">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4535">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4535">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4536">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4536">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4537">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4537">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4538">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4538">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4539">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4539">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4540">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4540">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4541">Имя значения: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4541">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4542">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4542">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4543">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4543">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4544">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4544">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4545">Имя ключа предпочтения: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4545">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4546">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4546">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4547">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4547">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverrideforfiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4548">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4548">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-of-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-warnings-about-downloads"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4549">Запретить обходить предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender о загрузках</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4549">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4550">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4550">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4551">В Windows с 77 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4551">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4552">MacOS с 79 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4552">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4553">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4553">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4554">Эта политика позволяет определить, могут ли пользователи переопределять предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender о непроверенных загрузках.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4554">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4555">Если вы включите эту политику, пользователи в вашей организации не смогут игнорировать предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender, и они не смогут завершить непроверенные загрузки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4555">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4556">Если вы отключите или не настроите эту политику, пользователи могут игнорировать предупреждения фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender и завершать непроверенные загрузки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4556">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4557">Эта политика доступна только для экземпляров Windows, присоединенных к домену Microsoft Active Directory, экземпляров Windows 10 Pro или Корпоративная, зарегистрированных для управления устройством, или экземпляров macOS, управляемых с помощью MDM или присоединенных к домену посредством MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4557">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4558">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4558">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4559">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4559">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4560">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4560">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4561">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4561">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4562">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4562">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4563">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4563">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4564">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4564">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4565">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4565">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4566">Уникальное имя GP: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4566">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4567">Имя GP: Предотвращение обхода предупреждений фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender о загрузках</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4567">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4568">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4568">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4569">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4569">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4570">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4570">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4571">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4571">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4572">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4572">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4573">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4573">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4574">Имя значения: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4574">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4575">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4575">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4576">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4576">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4577">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4577">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4578">Имя ключа предпочтения: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4578">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4579">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4579">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4580">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4580">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenallowlistdomains"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4581">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4581">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-domains-for-which-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-wont-trigger-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4582">Настройте список доменов, для которых фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender не будет вызывать предупреждения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4582">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4583">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4583">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4584">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4584">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4585">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4585">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4586">Настройте список доверенных доменов фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4586">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4587">Это означает, что фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender не будет проверять наличие потенциально вредоносных ресурсов, таких как фишинговое программное обеспечение и другие вредоносные программы, если исходные URL-адреса соответствуют этим доменам.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4587">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4588">Служба защиты загрузок фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender не будет проверять загрузки, размещенные на этих доменах.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4588">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4589">Если вы включите эту политику, фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender доверяет этим доменам.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4589">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4590">Если вы отключите или не установите эту политику, защита фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender по умолчанию будет применена ко всем ресурсам.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4590">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4591">Эта политика доступна только для экземпляров Windows, присоединенных к домену Microsoft Active Directory, экземпляров Windows 10 Pro или Корпоративная, зарегистрированных для управления устройством, или экземпляров macOS, управляемых с помощью MDM или присоединенных к домену посредством MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4591">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4592">Также обратите внимание, что эта политика не применяется, если в вашей организации включена Advanced Threat Protection в Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4592">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4593">Вместо этого вы должны настроить списки разрешенных и заблокированных сообщений в центре безопасности в Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4593">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4594">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4594">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4595">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4595">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4596">Может быть рекомендовано: Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4596">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4597">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4597">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4598">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4598">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4599">Список строк</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4599">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4600">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4600">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4601">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4601">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4602">Уникальное имя GP: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4602">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4603">Имя GP: Настройка списка доменов, для которых фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender не будет вызывать предупреждения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4603">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4604">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4604">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4605">Путь GP (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4605">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4606">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4606">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4607">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4607">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4608">Путь (обязательный): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4608">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4609">Путь (рекомендуется): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4609">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4610">Имя значения: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4610">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4611">Тип значения: список REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4611">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4612">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4612">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4613">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4613">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4614">Имя предпочтительного ключа: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4614">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4615">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4615">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4616">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4616">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4617">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4617">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4618">Настроить фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4618">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4619">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4619">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4620">На Windows и macOS начиная с 77 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4620">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4621">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4621">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4622">Этот параметр политики позволяет настроить, включать ли фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4622">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4623">Фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender предоставляет предупреждающие сообщения, чтобы помочь защитить ваших пользователей от потенциальных фишинговых и вредоносных программ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4623">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4624">По умолчанию фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4624">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4625">Если этот параметр включен, фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender включен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4625">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4626">Если вы отключите этот параметр, фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender будет отключен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4626">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4627">Если вы не настроите этот параметр, пользователи смогут выбирать, использовать ли фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4627">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4628">Эта политика доступна только для экземпляров Windows, присоединенных к домену Microsoft Active Directory, экземпляров Windows 10 Pro или Корпоративная, зарегистрированных для управления устройством, или экземпляров macOS, управляемых с помощью MDM или присоединенных к домену посредством MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4628">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4629">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4629">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4630">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4630">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4631">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4631">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4632">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4632">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4633">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4633">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4634">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4634">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4635">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4635">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4636">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4636">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4637">Уникальное имя GP: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4637">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4638">Название GP: Настройка фильтра SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4638">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4639">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4639">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4640">Путь к GP (рекомендуется): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge - Настройки по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределить)/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4640">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4641">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4641">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4642">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4642">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4643">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4643">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4644">Путь (рекомендуется): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4644">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4645">Имя значения: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4645">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4646">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4646">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4647">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4647">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4648">Информация о Mac и настройки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4648">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4649">Имя предпочтительного ключа: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4649">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4650">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4650">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4651">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4651">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenfortrusteddownloadsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4652">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4652">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-checks-on-downloads-from-trusted-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4653">Принудительно проверяет фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender на загрузку из надежных источников</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4653">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4654">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4654">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4655">В Windows с 78 и более поздних версий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4655">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4656">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4656">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4657">Этот параметр политики позволяет указать, будет ли фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender проверять репутацию загрузки из надежного источника.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4657">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4658">Если этот параметр включен или не настроен, фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender проверяет репутацию загрузки независимо от источника.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4658">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4659">Если этот параметр отключен, фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender не проверяет репутацию загрузки при загрузке из надежного источника.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4659">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4660">Эта политика доступна только для экземпляров Windows, присоединенных к домену Microsoft Active Directory, а также экземпляров Windows 10 Pro или Корпоративная, зарегистрированных для управления устройством.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4660">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4661">Поддерживаемые функции:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4661">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4662">Может быть обязательным: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4662">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4663">Может быть рекомендовано: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4663">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4664">Обновление динамической политики: Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4664">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4665">Тип данных:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4665">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4666">Boolean (Логическое)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4666">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4667">Сведения и параметры Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4667">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4668">Сведения о групповой политике (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4668">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4669">Уникальное имя GP: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4669">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4670">Имя GP: Принудительная проверка скачивания из надежных источников с применением фильтра SmartScreen Microsoft Defender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4670">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4671">Путь к GP (обязательно): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4671">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4672">Путь к GP (рекомендуется): Административные шаблоны/Microsoft Edge - Настройки по умолчанию (пользователи могут переопределить)/Настройки SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4672">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4673">Имя файла GP ADMX: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4673">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4674">Параметры реестра Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4674">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4675">Путь (обязательный): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4675">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4676">Путь (рекомендуется): ПРОГРАММНОЕ ОБЕСПЕЧЕНИЕ\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4676">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4677">Имя значения: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4677">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4678">Тип значения: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4678">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4679">Пример значения:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4679">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="36e66-4680">В начало</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4680">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenpuaenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4681">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4681">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-to-block-potentially-unwanted-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4682">Настройте фильтр SmartScreen в Microsoft Defender для блокировки потенциально нежелательных приложений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4682">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4683">Поддерживаемые версии:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4683">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="36e66-4684">На Windows и macOS начиная с 80 или позже</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4684">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="36e66-4685">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36e66-4685">Description</span></span>
